H0.text: Which A road crosses the Humber Bridge. A63

H1.text: Which A road crosses the Humber Bridge. A164

H2.text: Which A road crosses the Humber Bridge. A1079

H3.text: Which A road crosses the Humber Bridge. A15

A4.text: the route south was via the single-carriageway A63 and the A614 (via grid-locked Thorne) where it met the busy A18 and crossed the Stainforth and Keadby Canal at Keadby Bridge

A5.text: the existing Humber Bridge toll system was largely the same as it was when the bridge opened in 1981
